181: ***Emails regarding next steps will come from Bamboo HR - Please Ensure to check your junk mail when applying for jobs*** Quality Auditor Cannon Automotive Solutions, a division of Cleveland Cliffs Tooling and Stamping, has an immediate opportunity for a Quality Auditor in our Sylacauga, Alabama Stamping Facility. The Quality Inspector is responsible for the final stages of manufactured product before shipping to customer. The ideal candidate will have prior experience with Measuring Systems Analysis, be self-motivated, and thrive in a fast-paced work environment. We offer an excellent compensation and benefits package with career advancement opportunities. Primary Responsibilities: Process accurate documentation of manufacturing processes in a timely manner Inspect manufactured parts to ensure the products have no damage and are up to standard Complete weekly Internal audit /LPA Identify production welding processes Minimum Qualifications: 2 years of related work experience in a quality environment Ability to communicate effectively, both written and oral Ability to stand for long periods of time/ lift 23 kg (50 lbs) Ability to work independently and in a team environment Able to work 3-shift model: Midnights, Days, Afternoons, and required OT Preferred Qualifications: 5 years experience working in a manufacturing environment Cleveland-Cliffs is the largest flat-rolled steel company and the largest iron ore pellet producer in North America. The company is vertically integrated from mining through iron making, steelmaking, rolling, finishing and downstream with hot and cold stamping of steel parts and components.
